Tx scan on base

â”‚  Why: Simulation is inconclusive, so balance and approval effects may be incomplete.       â”‚

â”‚  ğŸ’° BALANCE CHANGES (coverage: low)                                                        â”‚
â”‚  - Simulation did not complete (execution reverted: custom error 0x4e487b71)               â”‚
â”‚  - wallet fast-mode enabled; trace fallback only.                                          â”‚
â”‚  - upstream RPC returned truncated trace results.                                          â”‚
â”‚  - Partial estimates:                                                                      â”‚
â”‚  - 0.005 ETH / - 50 USDC / + 49.7 DAI                                                      â”‚

â”‚  ğŸ” APPROVALS (coverage: low)                                                              â”‚
â”‚  - Could not verify approval changes; treat this as higher risk.                           â”‚

â”‚  Action: BLOCK â€” simulation is inconclusive; verify spender, recipient, and amounts first. â”‚
